betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §f§2Sieve§f is the main source of resources in this pack, but don't worry, it can be automated as soon as you get into the steam age!

§2§fRight-Click the §2Sieve§f with an §2Mesh§f to put it in and then hold Right-Click with the block you want to sift, for example§2 Dirt§f to get the resources you want from this block.

§2Sieves§f can be put nearby each other to sift multiple blocks at once! Pretty neat, or?
Like in almost any other modpacks, you will begin with punching trees to get wood, except this time in the sky and with no exploration needed.

As mentioned in the welcome quest, this modpack features §2Effortless Building§f!

§2Effortless Building§f makes building by a thousand times easier by allowing to build simple structures like floors and walls in an limited range that can be upgraded with §2Range Upgrades§f which you can acquire while progressing.

To access the menu of the mod, press and hold §2ALT§f.

This modpack also features an mod called §2Twerk-Sim 2K16§f!

This mod allows you to grow an sapling without bonemeal by spamming crouch near it.

This Modpack features §2OreExcavation§f!

§2OreExcavation§f allows to mine all blocks of the same type §2at once§f when holding down the button assigned to it (standard assigned to §8§2grave§f, can be changed in controls).

Useful, or?

Breaking §2§2Leaves§f with an §2Crook §fwill increase the overall chance of their drops and allows to obtain an special item called §f§2Silkworm§f.

§2§fRight-Clicking §f§2Leaves§f with an §1§2Silkworm§f will turn them into §2Infested Leaves§f, wait till their "infestation" is done and break them with an §2Crook§f to obtain lots of §2String§f!

Getting an §2Barrel §fwill allow you getting §2dirt§f by putting compostables in like §2saplings §fwhich can be looked up in JEI.

It also allows various§2 fluid transformations§f for different kinds of materials like §2soul sand§f, just right click the barrel in JEI to see what's possible with it!

Getting an §2Crucible§f out of wood will allow you to obtain early §2Water §fin this pack and right-clicking it with §2Dust§k§f while it's filled with §2Water§f will allow you to obtain early §f§3§3§2Clay§f.

Don't forget to make your 2x2 infinite water source, so you don't have to do this everytime you want water!

Welcome to §2Gregtech: Skybound§f!

§2Gregtech: Skybound§f is an lightweight skyblock modpack focussing mainly around §2Gregtech CE: Unofficial§f with some QoL and utility mods like §2Applied Energistics 2§f or §2Effortless building§f!

These Quests here will try to teach you through the early progression of this modpack and of Gregtech.

Hope you enjoy this pack!
The §2Hammer§f allows you to grind down various blocks, like §2Cobblestone§f into §3§2Gravel§f, §2Gravel§f into §2Sand§f, and so on.
It's finally time to craft an §2Furnace§f! No funny description this time.

The §2Clay Bucket§f is the earliest way of transferring Fluids like §2Water§f.
Note that it will break when transferring §2Lava§f!

The §2Crucible§f made out of §2Bricks§f will allow you to obtain §2Lava§f easily by putting any Stones in it when an appropiate heat source like an §2Torch§f is under it. 
Be sure to check JEI which stone yields the most §2Lava§!!

§2Witch Water§e§f is an very useful fluid early and can be used to create as example an endless §2Dirt§f or §2Stone§f generator that generates all types of Stone!

To obtain §2Witch Water§f, use the §2Ancient Spores§f you obtained by sifting §2Dirt§f earlier on an 3x3 §2Dirt§f field by clicking on the middle block to transform it to §2Mycelium§f. Place an §2Barrel §fwith §2Water§a§f in it and it will begin slowly to transform into §2Witch Water§f! Note that this process also generates§2 Mushrooms§f.

As mentioned in an earlier quest, §2Witch Water§f allows you to make an unlimited §2Stone§f generator that generates any type of Stone! 
It works just like an cobblestone generator, but instead of the §2Water§f place there §2Lava§f and where the §2Lava§f normally is §2Witch Water§f.

It is important that the §2Witch Water§f floats to the §2Lava§f, not the other way around because then it creates an normal cobblestone generator!

As mentioned in the earlier quest, you can make with§2 Witch Water§f an generator that generates endless §2Dirt§f. You can do that by making an simple Cobblestone generator but instead of §2Lava§f you use §2Witch water§f! §k§k§k

Flint Tools are the first GT Tools available in this pack and have fairly decent durability.

Some Tools have an unique feature compared to their vanilla versions, for example will the §2Axe§f cut down a whole tree instead of needing to break every single log, or the §2Pickaxe§f will place §2Torches§f when Right-Clicking a block.

Now that you have obtained all kinds of Stones, it's time to actually obtain some important resources like §f§2Iron§k§f or §2Copper§f!

Here won't be listed where to obtain which resource, so please look up in JEI where to obtain which ore!

Gregtech also has Tools that are mainly used for Crafting like the §a§3§2Hammer §for §2File§e.

§fThose will be used ALOT in the progression, but don't worry, you can later on make items like §2Plates §fand §2Screws §fin machines so you don't have to make it by hand all the time.

NOTE: This quest accepts either§2 Wrought Iron§f or §2Iron §ftools.
Finally, an real Bucket.

§2Wrought Iron§f is an very durable tool material early on, it has the double durability of §2Iron§f and is very easy to make.

§k§l§fIt's made by putting§2 Iron Nuggets§f in an §2Furnace§  and combining the §foutcoming §2Wrought Iron Nuggets§f into an §2Wrought Iron Ingot§f.

§2Bronze§f is an important alloy made out of §2Tin§f and§2 Copper§f that will be needed to get into the§e Steam Age§f!

It is made by combining §2§f3 §2Copper dust§f and 1 §2§2Tin dust§f in an crafting table and smelting the outcoming §2Bronze dust §fin an §2Furnace§f.

The §2Bronze Mesh§f is the next tier Mesh, allowing to obtain new materials like §2Redstone§f or §2Silver§f. 

These materials will be important in the later progression.

The §2Block Breaker§f will automatically break blocks in front of it, it can be used to easily automate the generators you already built up.

It's working state can be easily toggled with an lever.

As you may have noticed, §2Charcoal§f cannot be made in an §2Furnace§f, you need to make it in an §2Coke Oven§f.

The §2Coke Oven§f§f is the first Multiblock you can make in this Pack, it's 3x3x3 and hollow in the middle.

It's the early way of obtaining §2Charcoal§f and gives as byproduct§2 Creosote§f, which can be used to make §2Treated Wood§f that will become handy later on.

The §2Hatches§f allow for basic automation with hoppers, pipes, etc. They can output both §2Creosote §fand §2Charcoal§f and allow inputting §2Wood§f.

It also accepts §2Coal§f, and will output an more powerful fuel called §2Coke§f!

Getting an §2Solid Fuel Steam Boiler§f will bring you torwards §eAge 0 - The Steam Age§f!

Simply just put §2Water§f into the §2Boiler§f and then put an burnable fuel in like §2Coal§f§f and wait for it to build up heat by watching the red bar going up, then it will begin to produce §2Steam§f! It won't output §2Steam§f to the bottom.

§fNOTE: Never put §2Water§f into the §2Boiler§f while it's hot and empty, else it will explode!

Welcome to §eAge 0 - The Steam Age§f! While you can't make electricity yet, you can make Steam Machines now, which will help you out alot early.

In this Chapter will be alot explained about Gregtech and how many things work, be prepared to be confronted with alot of information as of now!
The §2Primitive Pump§f is an Multiblock that produces water infinitely
No Description
